attributes.action: LOOK INTO WHY ALL PCT's  ARE NOT FUNDING ANTI-TNF FOR PATIENTS WITH ANKYLOSING SPONDYLITIS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am petitioning to be funded by Bromley PCT to be kept on ANTI-TNF drug for the above disease. l have been on a clinical drug trial for 5 years on this life changing drug and have now been denied funding to stay on drug.Also for other sufferers of this awful disease that are being denied funding for this drug.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "LOOK INTO WHY ALL PCT's ARE NOT FUNDING ANTI-TNF FOR PATIENTS WITH ANKYLOSING SPONDYLITIS."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16541


Prime Minister's Office
